subcategories.title: Formulas That Release Wind Cold

formulas.name: Gui Zhi Tang
formulas.explanation: w-c w/ mild sweating

formulas.name: Ma Huang Tang
formulas.explanation: excess w-c w/ no sweat, choose for asthma/wheeze

formulas.name: Da Qing Long Tang
formulas.explanation: like ma huang tang, but w/ interior heat

formulas.name: Xiao Qing Long Tang
formulas.explanation: w-c w/ congested fluids (LU phlegm + coughing)

formulas.name: Jiu Wei Qiang Huo Tang
formulas.explanation: release exterior w-c-d (80%), clear internal heat (20%)

formulas.name: Xiang Su San
formulas.explanation: w-c w/ qi stagnation in MJ

formulas.name: Xiang Ru San
formulas.explanation: w-c w/ interior dampness

formulas.name: Cong Chi Tang
formulas.explanation: early stage w-c w/ mild symptoms

subcategories.title: Formulas That Release Exterior Wind Heat

formulas.name: Sang Ju Yin
formulas.explanation: for ext. w-h w/ COUGH (shares 5 out of 6 ingredients with yin qiao san)

formulas.name: Yin Qiao San
formulas.explanation: classic formula for wind-heat w/ SORE THROAT

formulas.name: Chai Ge Jie Ji Tang
formulas.english: Bupleurum and Kudzu Decoction to Release the Muscle Layer
formulas.explanation: for ext. w-c turning into heat affecting the muscle layer (eye pain, headache, toothache, body aches)

formulas.name: Sheng Ma Ge Gen Tang
formulas.explanation: releases exterior, muscle layer and VENTS RASHES (esp measles, like if you want the rash to express and release to the surface)

formulas.name: Chuan Bei Pi Pa Gao
formulas.explanation: patent syrup for sore throat and cough

formulas.name: Chuan Xin Lian Kang Yan Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: Clears heat, resolves toxin, cools blood, disperses swelling. Clears heat and reduces inflammation in the three burners

formulas.name: Gan Mao Ling
formulas.explanation: patent: Releases the exterior, dispels wind, clears heat, relieves symptoms of the common cold

formulas.name: Yin Qiao Jie Du Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: for the early stages of colds and flu, especially when symptoms include sore throat and fever

subcategories.title: Formulas that Release the Exterior with Head and Neck Symptoms

formulas.name: Chuan Xiong Cha Tiao San
formulas.english: Ligusticum Powder to be Taken with Green Tea
formulas.explanation: wind invasion (heat or cold) w/ HEADACHE

formulas.name: Cang Er Zi San
formulas.explanation: wind-cold attacking head causing NASAL DISCHARGE, sinus infection or congestion

formulas.name: Ge Gen Tang
formulas.explanation: w-c w/ STIFF NECK/UPPER BACK

formulas.name: Bi Yan Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: clears congestion, sinus infection, and cools nasal inflammation

formulas.name: Chuan Xiong Cha Tiao Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: treats head/neck, disperses wind, alleviates pain

formulas.name: Ke Chuan Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: Cough and wheezing with external wind invasion. mostly treats the symptom

formulas.name: Pian Tou Tong Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: Dispels wind, alleviates pain, unblocks meridians, relieves headaches

formulas.name: Te Xiao Bi Min Gan Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: Dispels wind, opens nasal passages, clears heat, relieves allergy symptoms

subcategories.title: Formulas That Release the Exterior with Concurrent Deficiency Patterns

formulas.name: Ren Shen Bai Du San
formulas.english: Ginseng Powder to Overcome Pathogenic Influences
formulas.explanation: for ext. wind cold damp w/ qi deficiency (mostly for children)

formulas.name: Ma Huang Xi Xin Fu Zi Tang
formulas.english: Ephedra, Asarum and Prepared Aconite Decoction
formulas.explanation: w-c w/ concurrent yang deficiency

formulas.name: Jia Jian Wei Rui Tang
formulas.explanation: for wind-heat w/ yin deficiency

formulas.name: Zai Zao San
formulas.explanation: for ext. w-c w/ qi and yang def.

subcategories.title: Formulas That Release the Exterior with Underlying Excess (Interior)

formulas.name: Ge Gen Huang Qin Huang Lian Tang
formulas.explanation: wind-heat (30%) w/ damp heat diarrhea (70%)

formulas.name: Fang Feng Tong Sheng San
formulas.explanation: for concurrent wind-heat, interior heat, and constipation

formulas.name: Shi Gao Tang
formulas.explanation: w-c w/ internal heat (severe internal heat)

formulas.name: Wu Ji San
formulas.explanation: w-c w/ interior cold, damp, phlegm, qi, and blood stagnation

subcategories.title: Formulas That Clear Heat from the Qi Level

formulas.name: Bai Hu Tang
formulas.explanation: king formula for true heat in the qi level (irritable, 4 bigs, bright red, tropical/childhood diseases, encephalitis, periodontitus, arthritis)

formulas.name: Zhu Ye Shi Gao Tang
formulas.explanation: clears qi level heat w/ some damaged fluids and yin. generates fluids when heat is moving into yin def. heat (late stage chronic febrile diseases)

formulas.name: Zhi Zi Chi Tang
formulas.explanation: irritability due to lingering qi level heat

subcategories.title: Formulas That Clear Heat from Ying/Xue and Cool Blood

formulas.name: Xi Jiao Di Huang Tang
formulas.explanation: clears heat, cools blood, moves blood. This is for deep blood level heat: thirst with inability to swallow, always shen disturbed

formulas.name: Qing Ying Tang
formulas.explanation: clears heat from ying level (delerium/*shen disturbance, thirst, speckled rash, purpura)

subcategories.title: Formulas That Clear Heat & Relieve Toxicity

formulas.name: Huang Lian Jie Du Tang
formulas.explanation: excess toxic heat and fire in all 3 jiaos, all organ heat

formulas.name: Xie Xin Tang
formulas.explanation: d-h toxins w/ clumping. Heat in all 3 jiaos but cleared thru stool. For deep toxic heat like sepsis w/ constipation

formulas.name: Xian Fang Huo Ming Yin
formulas.explanation: reduces swelling from absesses (mastitis/drains pus; can be used topically or orally)

formulas.name: Pu Ji Xiao Du Yin
formulas.english: Universal Benefit Decoction to Eliminate Toxin
formulas.explanation: clears heat and toxin, esp mumps (swollen pudgy face). More for acute UJ toxic heat

formulas.name: Liu Shen Wan
formulas.explanation: relieves fire toxin, swelling and pain esp severe sore throat/chronic hepatitis (has toad venom)

formulas.name: Qing Wen Bai Du Yin
formulas.english: Clear Epidemics and Overcome Toxicity Decoction
formulas.explanation: epidemic toxin pathogen with severe heat in blood/qi levels with stabbing headache

formulas.name: Fang Feng Tong Sheng Pian
formulas.explanation: patents: general detox - cooling and purging

formulas.name: Huang Lian Shang Qing Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: toxic heat - mouth,eyes,nose,gums,lips

formulas.name: Xiang Yin Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: voice loss and throat discomfort, especially in singers, speakers, and those who rely on vocal strength

formulas.name: Zhen Zhu An Chuang Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: for acne and other skin eruptions caused by heat and toxin accumulation

subcategories.title: Formulas That Clear Heat from the Organs

formulas.name: Qing Wei San
formulas.explanation: clears ST channel heat such as bleeding gums, toothache, dry mouth

formulas.name: Dao Chi San
formulas.explanation: excess or deficient HT heat w/ UB symptoms and mouth/tongue sores

formulas.name: Long Dan Xie Gan Tang
formulas.english: Gentiana Decoction to Drain the Liver
formulas.explanation: excess LIV/GB fire; all 3 jiaos

formulas.name: Bai Tou Weng Tang
formulas.explanation: hot dysenteric disorders due to damp heat toxin in LI (more blood than pus)

formulas.name: Yin Qiao Ma Bo San
formulas.explanation: clears toxic heat from the LU, esp sore throat (does not release the exterior, so more for interior)

formulas.name: Ma Xing Shi Gan Tang
formulas.english: Ephedra, Apricot Kernel, Gypsum and Licorice Decoction
formulas.explanation: clears heat from LU, for excess hot cough, interior conditions. Formula is colder than ma huang tang

formulas.name: Xie Bai San
formulas.explanation: for children w/ yin def. LU heat and a chronic cough

formulas.name: Yu Nu Jian
formulas.explanation: drains heat from ST and nourishes yin. Fire starts in the ST and damages KID

formulas.name: Xie Huang San
formulas.explanation: dispenses/lifts hidden smoldering fire from the SP, then clears it from the qi level (mouth ulcers, heart burn, gastritis)

formulas.name: Zuo Jin Wan
formulas.explanation: clears LIV fire and prevents LIV overacting on ST (nausea, vomit, groin area heat, hernia/teste pain)

formulas.name: Dun Sou San
formulas.explanation: Clears heat from the Lung and relieves cough and wheezing, transforms phlegm, and soothes the chest

formulas.name: Li Niao Pai Shi Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: kidney stones, gallstones, urinary tract infection, acute polynephritis, vesical calcular

formulas.name: Ma Xing Zhi Ke Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: wind heat invading the lung/UJ, redirects rebellious Lung Qi downward, resolves Phlegm, regulates Qi, vents Heat to the Exterior

formulas.name: Qing Fei Tang
formulas.explanation: patent: Clears heat from the lungs, transforms phlegm, stops cough, nourishes Yin

subcategories.title: Formulas That Clear Heat from Deficiency

formulas.name: Qing Hao Bie Jia Tang
formulas.english: Artemisia Annua and Soft-Shelled Turtle Decoction
formulas.explanation: clears yin deficiency heat from late stage febrile disease and unremitting fevers

formulas.name: Qing Gu San
formulas.explanation: clears severe heat from yin deficiency with steaming bone sensation

subcategories.title: Formulas That Relieve Summerheat

formulas.name: Liu Yi San
formulas.explanation: promotes urination for mild summerheat with dampness

formulas.name: Gui Ling Gan Lu Yin
formulas.english: Cinnamon and Poria Sweet Dew Decoction
formulas.explanation: sudden turmoil in summer: diarrhea + vomiting, heat and damp; more heat than Liu Yi San

formulas.name: Qing Luo Yin
formulas.explanation: prevents and treats summerheat, especially when it affects LU (all fresh ingredients)

formulas.name: Qing Shu Yi Qi Tang
formulas.english: Clear Summerheat and Augment the Qi Decoction
formulas.explanation: clears summerheat, boosts qi, generates fluids (for dehydration/sweat depletion/yin deficiency)

formulas.name: Bi Yu San
formulas.explanation: clears summerheat w/ constrained heat in the LIV/GB

subcategories.title: Formulas That Drain Downward: Purge Heat Accumulation

formulas.name: Da Cheng Qi Tang
formulas.explanation: strongest formula for yang ming fu syndrome excess heat constipation (like from opiate drugs, postpartum)

formulas.name: Xiao Cheng Qi Tang
formulas.explanation: milder yang ming fu constipation syndrome than Da Cheng Qi Tang

formulas.name: Tiao Wei Cheng Qi Tang
formulas.english: Regulate the Stomach and Order the Qi Decoction
formulas.explanation: mildest of the 3 (vs Da Cheng Qi Tang and Xiao Cheng Qi Tang), symptoms include hardness but less distention, therefore the qi regulators are omitted

formulas.name: Liang Ge San
formulas.explanation: fire in the MJ/UJ with constipation

formulas.name: Da Huang Mu Dan Tang
formulas.explanation: damp heat in LJ/MJ (i.e. LI), for things like early stage intestinal abscess (appendicitis), damp heat leukorrhea, bladder mass, ovarian cysts, postpartum infections

formulas.name: Da Xian Xiong Tang
formulas.english: Major Sinking into the Chest Decoction
formulas.explanation: heat and water stagnation in chest, such as pleurisy, or in the middle such as cirrhosis of LIV

formulas.name: Huang Long Tang
formulas.explanation: purges and tonifies; purges while supporting normal qi (ren shen+3sweets)

formulas.name: Zeng Ye Cheng Qi Tang
formulas.english: Increase the Fluids and Order the Qi Decoction
formulas.explanation: gentle for severe constipation due to depletion of fluids, often after high fever or prolonged illness

subcategories.title: Formulas That Drain Downward: Moist Laxatives

formulas.name: Ma Zi Ren Wan
formulas.explanation: treats constipation due to dryness and blood deficiency and heat. formula is cool (vs run chang wan)

formulas.name: Run Chang Wan
formulas.english: Moisten the Intestines Pill from Master Chen's Book
formulas.explanation: more for blood deficiency dry constipation than heat, compared to Ma Zi Ren Wan. formula is warmer than that

formulas.name: Ji Chuan Jian
formulas.explanation: more warming than run chang wan and ma zi ren wan, but also moistening; for constipation due to yang deficiency (low back pain etc)

formulas.name: Tong Chang Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: constipation, especially in elderly or deficient individuals, and supports gentle, regular elimination

subcategories.title: Formulas That Drain Downward: Warm the Yang and Guide Out Accumulation

formulas.name: Da Huang Fu Zi Tang
formulas.explanation: warms the interior and purges constipation (vs ji chuan jian is more about moistening)

formulas.name: Wen Pi Tang
formulas.explanation: MJ qi and yang deficiency causing constipation; focus here is on tonifying; sources differ on the chiefs: Bensky says fu zi and da huang are chiefs

formulas.name: San Wu Bei Ji Wan
formulas.explanation: sudden severe cold blockage, such as intestinal obstruction

subcategories.title: Formulas That Drain Downward: Drive Out Excess Water

formulas.name: Shi Zao Tang
formulas.explanation: purges excess water accumulation from the chest

formulas.name: Zhou Che Wan
formulas.explanation: heat and fluid accumulation and qi stagnation; mostly middle jiao

subcategories.title: Formulas That Harmonize: Harmonize Lesser Yang-stage Disorders (Shao Yang)

formulas.name: Xiao Chai Hu Tang
formulas.explanation: typical shao yang pattern: fullness, GB heat, bitter taste, alternating chills/fever; pathogen is in "midstage"

formulas.name: Da Chai Hu Tang
formulas.explanation: a more purging version of Xiao Chai Hu Tang; this has shao yang (alt. c/f, bitter taste) and yang ming features (constipation)

formulas.name: Hao Qin Qing Dan Tang
formulas.english: Artemisia Annua and Scutellaria Decoction to Clear the Gallbladder Decoction
formulas.explanation: damp heat and turbid phlegm in shao yang channels (distention in flank and chest); GB and ST heat; drains damp through urine

formulas.name: Chai Hu Gui Zhi Tang
formulas.explanation: complex presentations with liver qi contraint or liver-stomach dysharmony with a background of spleen qi deficiency and dampness

subcategories.title: Formulas That Harmonize: Harmonize Liver and Spleen

formulas.name: Si Ni San
formulas.explanation: cold extremities due to LIV qi stagnation, LIV invading ST with heat

formulas.name: Xiao Yao San
formulas.explanation: LIV Qi Stagnation with underlying Spleen and Blood Deficiency

formulas.name: Jia Wei Xiao Yao San
formulas.explanation: LIV Qi Stagnation turning to Heat with underlying Spleen and Blood Deficiency

formulas.name: Tong Xie Yao Fang
formulas.explanation: painful diarrhea due to LIV overacting on SP; worse with stress

formulas.name: Chai Hu Shu Gan San
formulas.english: Bupleurum Powder to Spread the Liver
formulas.explanation: severe LIV qi stagnation affecting ST/SP. si ni san + 2 qi regulators

formulas.name: Shao Yao Gan Cao Tang
formulas.explanation: LIV/SP blood deficiency, injury to fluids, and painful spasms

formulas.name: Chai Hu Shu Gan Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: spreads liver qi for pms, dysmenorrhea etc

formulas.name: Shu Gan Tang
formulas.explanation: patent: Soothes the Liver, regulates Qi, dispels blood stasis, alleviates pain, harmonizes the middle Jiao

formulas.name: Xiang Sha Yang Wei Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: Tonifies and strengthens the Spleen and Stomach, regulates Qi, relieves bloating and discomfort, supports digestion

formulas.name: Yi Gan San
formulas.explanation: patent: Liver Qi constraint manifesting as emotional or behavioral issues, especially in children, and for mild digestive weakness

subcategories.title: Formulas That Harmonize: Harmonize Stomach and Intestines

formulas.name: Ban Xia Xie Xin Tang
formulas.english: Pinellia Decoction to Drain the Epigastrium
formulas.explanation: mixed pattern of cold/heat, excess/def, ST rebellious qi and internal clumping. Good for complex MJ issues

formulas.name: Huang Lian Tang
formulas.explanation: heat in chest and cold in ST, possibly some exterior pathogen (hence gui zhi)

formulas.name: Kang Ning Wan
formulas.explanation: patent: any kind of MJ upset; nausea, motion sickness, bloating, diarrhea, vomit, overeating, food poisoning etc

formulas.name: Mu Xiang Shun Qi Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: Regulates Qi, relieves abdominal bloating and discomfort, harmonizes the stomach and intestines, supports digestion

formulas.name: Sheng Yang Qi Wei Tang
formulas.english: Raise the Yang and Augment the Stomach Decoction
formulas.explanation: patent: Raises Yang Qi, augments Stomach and Spleen Qi, harmonizes the Middle Jiao, dispels wind damp

subcategories.title: Formulas That Expel Dampness: Promote Urination and Leach Out Dampness

formulas.name: Wu Ling San
formulas.explanation: edema due to deficiency and water accumulation (just the dampness - no infection present)

formulas.name: Zhu Ling Tang
formulas.explanation: lin syndrome w/ yin deficiency damp-heat

formulas.name: Wu Pi San
formulas.explanation: edema due to dampness and qi stagnation (urine is not flowing properly causing edema)

formulas.name: Fang Ji Huang Qi Tang
formulas.explanation: wind-damp bi pain with exterior wei deficiency - this is more tonifying than wu pi san

formulas.name: Wu Pi Yin
formulas.explanation: for Spleen/Kidney Deficiency with vigorous Dampness and Qi Stagnation

formulas.name: Wu Pi Yin
formulas.explanation: patent: Clears damp-heat, promotes urination, unblocks painful urinary dribbling, dissolves stones

subcategories.title: Formulas That Expel Dampness: Transform Damp Turbidity

formulas.name: Ping Wei San
formulas.explanation: dries damp, strengthens SP, moves qi (mostly MJ symptoms of damp)

formulas.name: Huo Xiang Zheng Qi San
formulas.english: Agastache Powder to Rectify the Qi
formulas.explanation: exterior invasion with qi/damp stagnation (i.e. ST flu)

subcategories.title: Formulas That Expel Dampness: Clear Damp Heat

formulas.name: Ba Zheng San
formulas.explanation: UTI, heat and blood Lin syndrome (promotes urination and makes urinary tract smooth)

formulas.name: Yin Chen Hao Tang
formulas.explanation: clears yang type damp heat jaundice

formulas.name: Shao Yao Tang
formulas.explanation: damp-heat dysentery with qi and blood stagnation (should be equal parts blood and pus in stool)

formulas.name: Er Miao San
formulas.explanation: LJ damp-heat, especially legs and feet (can be from unknown causes). Originally meant for gout

formulas.name: San Ren Tang
formulas.explanation: clears damp-heat in all 3 jiaos, moves qi, promotes urination to move damp (more for water retention)

formulas.name: Qian Lie Shu Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: Clears heat, promotes urination, supports prostate health, relieves discomfort and swelling

formulas.name: Si Miao Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: damp-heat conditions affecting the lower body, including joint pain and swelling

formulas.name: Yu Dai Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: for abnormal damp heat vaginal discharge and related discomfort, supporting gynecological health

subcategories.title: Formulas That Expel Dampness: Warm and Transform Water

formulas.name: Zhen Wu Tang
formulas.explanation: edema due for SP and KID yang deficiency

formulas.name: Shi Pi Yin
formulas.explanation: edema below waist w/ SP yang deficiency and lots of qi stagnation (more moving than Zhen Wu Tang)

formulas.name: Bi Xie Fen Qing Yin
formulas.english: Dioscorea Decoction to Separate the Clear
formulas.explanation: cloudy lin syndrome caused by cold and damp (don't use for damp-heat because it's warm)

subcategories.title: Formulas That Expel Dampness: Dispel Wind-Damp

formulas.name: Juan Bi Tang
formulas.explanation: wind cold bi pain w/ focus on upper body w/ qi deficiency (shoulder, neck, arm)

formulas.name: Qiang Huo Sheng Shi Tang
formulas.explanation: for mild exterior wind-cold invasion of upper body (tai yang) w/ muscle aches and headache of a wind-cold-damp type

formulas.name: Du Huo Ji Sheng Tang
formulas.explanation: chronic bi pain of wind-cold-damp type w/ kid/liver and qi/blood deficiency. Focus is on the lower body

formulas.name: Gui Zhi Shao Yao Zhi Mu Tang
formulas.english: Cinnamon Twig, Peony, and Anemarrhena Decoction
formulas.explanation: w-c-d bi pain with localized heat in joints due to stagnation

formulas.name: Feng Shi Xiao Tong Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: Warm Wind Damp Disperse Pain Pill

formulas.name: Jian Zhou Tong Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: treats shoulder pain

formulas.name: Jing Fang Bai Du San
formulas.explanation: patent: Warms wind-cold-damp all over the body, stop pain, warms channels

formulas.name: Te Xiao Jing Zhui Tong Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: pain and stiffness in the neck due to blood stasis, wind-damp, and deficiency

formulas.name: Xi Guan Jie Tong Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: knee and joint pain, especially due to wind-damp, blood stasis, and deficiency

formulas.name: Zuo Gu Shen Jing Tong Pian
formulas.explanation: patent: to relieve sciatic nerve pain and lower limb discomfort by invigorating blood and clearing obstructions in the channels

subcategories.title: Formulas That Warm Interior Cold

formulas.name: Li Zhong Wan
formulas.explanation: SP deficiency with cold, no thirst/appetite, abdominal pain, pale tongue

formulas.name: Wu Zhu Yu Tang
formulas.explanation: vomiting due to cold MJ and liver/stomach disharmony (warms interior). Should involve vomiting unlike Li Zhong Wang

formulas.name: Xiao Jian Zhong Tang
formulas.explanation: warms MJ, replenishes qi, relieves abdominal spasms

formulas.name: Da Jian Zhong Tang
formulas.explanation: severe cold pain in MJ with vomiting

formulas.name: Si Ni Tang
formulas.explanation: true extreme cold from yang deficiency with yang collapse

formulas.name: Shen Fu Tang
formulas.english: Ginseng and Aconite Accessory Root Decoction
formulas.explanation: yang collapse with qi deficiency with cold phlegm. only for acute conditions

formulas.name: Dang Gui Si Ni Tang
formulas.explanation: cold in channels with blood deficiency

subcategories.title: Formulas That Treat Dryness: Gently Disperse and Moisten

formulas.name: Xing Su San
formulas.english: Apricot Kernel and Perilla Leaf Powder
formulas.explanation: disperses cool dryness, stops cough, transforms mucus

formulas.name: Sang Xing Tang
formulas.english: Mulberry Leaf and Apricot Kernel Decoction
formulas.explanation: disperses warm dryness, moistens a dry cough. contraindicated in yin damage because Zhi Zi is too drying

formulas.name: Qing Zao Jiu Fei Tang
formulas.english: Eliminate Dryness and Rescue the Lungs Decoction
formulas.explanation: more serious LU def. and more severe heat than Sang Xing Tang (has sang ye AND shi gao)

subcategories.title: Formulas That Treat Dryness: Enrich Yin and Moisten Dryness

formulas.name: Bai He Gu Jin Tang
formulas.english: Lily Bulb Decoction to Preserve the Metal
formulas.explanation: KID and LU def. w/ hot dryness and phlegm-cough (emphasis on the dryness)

formulas.name: Mai Men Dong Tang
formulas.explanation: LU/ST yin def. w/ rebellious qi

formulas.name: Zeng Ye Tang
formulas.explanation: LI dryness from injury to fluids. Will "float the boat" and expel hard dry stool

formulas.name: Bu Fei E Jiao Tang
formulas.english: Tonify the Lungs Decoction with Ass-Hide Gelatin
formulas.explanation: LU yin def. w/ reckless bleeding from heat (less severe than Bai He Gu Ji Tang)

formulas.name: Yang Yin Qing Fei Tang
formulas.english: Nourish the Yin and Clear the Lungs Decoction
formulas.explanation: toxic swelling in throat; i.e. diptheria infection

subcategories.title: Formulas That Tonify: Tonify the Qi

formulas.name: Si Jun Zi Tang
formulas.explanation: base formula for SP qi deficiency

formulas.name: Shen Ling Bai Zhu San
formulas.english: Ginseng, Poria and Atractylodes Macrocephala Powder
formulas.explanation: SP qi def w/ cold damp and diarrhea. Chief complaint is diarrhea/loose stools w/ SP qi def symptoms

formulas.name: Bu Zhong Yi Qi Tang
formulas.english: Tonify the Middle and Augment the Qi Decoction
formulas.explanation: sinking, prolapse, debility after a long illness (can be physical or emotional). Severe fatigue or organ prolapse. Warm formula so dont use if existing heat symptoms

formulas.name: Sheng Mai San
formulas.explanation: LU qi and yin def. w/ palpatations and shortness of breath. Only use after pathogens have been completely expelled first

formulas.name: Liu Jun Zi Tang
formulas.explanation: SP qi def. w/ damp (feel bloating and "sloshy" like edema in middle, worse after eating)

formulas.name: Xiang Sha Liu Jun Zi Tang
formulas.english: Six-Gentleman Decoction with Aucklandia and Amomum
formulas.explanation: Sp def. w/ qi stagnation and pain (bloating, indigestion, stomache ache)

formulas.name: Ren Shen Ge Jie San
formulas.explanation: chronic cough w/ def, heat, and phlegm. a mixed pattern

subcategories.title: Formulas That Tonify: Tonify the Blood

formulas.name: Si Wu Tang
formulas.explanation: basic blood tonic formula

formulas.name: Tao Hong Si Wu Tang
formulas.english: Four-Substance Decoction with Safflower and Peach Pit
formulas.explanation: blood def. and blood stagnation. Good for amenorrhea

formulas.name: Wu Ji Bai Feng Wan
formulas.explanation: patent: women's health, especially for menstrual irregularities, postpartum weakness, and general tonification

subcategories.title: Formulas That Tonify: Tonify the Qi and Blood Together

formulas.name: Dang Gui Bu Xue Tang
formulas.english: Tangkuei Decoction to Tonify the Blood
formulas.explanation: qi and blood depletion, blood loss. Jumpstarts severe blood loss after things like surgery/trauma

formulas.name: Gui Pi Tang
formulas.explanation: tonifies SP qi and HT blood

formulas.name: Ba Zhen Tang
formulas.explanation: qi and blood def (LU, SP, LIV)

formulas.name: Shi Quan Da Bu Tang
formulas.explanation: further tonifies qi and blood for more pronounced cold symptoms (vs Ba Zhen Tang)

formulas.name: Zhi Gan Cao Tang
formulas.explanation: tonifies qi, blood, and yin for irregular heart rate

formulas.name: Ren Shen Yang Ying Tang
formulas.english: Ginseng Decoction to Nourish the Nutritive Qi
formulas.explanation: tonifies qi and blood, calms the shen (compare to gui pi tang)

formulas.name: Tai Shan Pan Shi San
formulas.english: Powder that Gives the Stability of Mount Tai
formulas.explanation: habitual miscarriage due to qi and blood def.

subcategories.title: Formulas That Tonify: Tonify the Yin

formulas.name: Liu Wei Di Huang Wan
formulas.explanation: nourish KID yin, drain fire. Basic yin def module

formulas.name: Zuo Gui Wan
formulas.explanation: tonifies KID yin, jing and marrow. Does not clear heat

formulas.name: Qi Ju Di Huang Wan
formulas.english: Lycium Fruit, Chrysanthemum and Rehmannia Pill
formulas.explanation: nourish yin and blood to nourish eyes (focus is on the eyes)

formulas.name: Zhi Bai Di Huang Wan
formulas.explanation: clears heat and KID fire more strongly than Liu Wei Di Huang Wan

formulas.name: Er Long Zuo Ci Wan
formulas.english: Pill for Deafness that is Kind to the Left [Kidney] Pill
formulas.explanation: nourishes KID yin to benefit hearing
